title: Is anyone know what font is this?
author: tammeyim

comments.content:
Embroidery. The companies have their own fonts for the machines. Looks like a design sold as "Athletic Flair"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415095949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EmbroideryAthleticFlairSM_5857.jpg)
 with some distortion -- particularly for M -- due to the curved layout.  
Don
